instructions:
Here are the steps you need to follow for converting your FBX files to USDZ.

Go to Aspose.3D conversion appUpload your FBX file to the browserSelect USDZ as output file formatPress the Convert button

Once the conversion process completes, you will be opted to save the converted USDZ file to disc.
You can convert FBX file to USDZ in your C#, Java, and Python applications as shown in the following sections.

Converting FBX files to USDZ format using the Aspose.3D for .NET API is a simple process. This powerful API enables you to develop robust applications for converting FBX files into different formats. For in-depth knowledge about Aspose.3D for .NET, refer to the following resources.
